Title: FUNC-01: Cover Page Generation During Report Creation
COS Reference/Expected Results: Cover page generated and included in the report when the option is checked

Step Expected: UI shows the cover page option
Cover page is included in the generated report

Title: FUNC-02: Cover Page Content Verification
COS Reference/Expected Results: Cover page contains the correct content

Step Action: Generate a report with a cover page

Step Expected: Cover page content matches the expected content

Title: NEG-01: Cover Page Not Generated When Option Not Checked
COS Reference/Expected Results: Cover page is not generated when the option is not checked

Step Expected: UI shows the cover page option
Cover page is not included in the generated report

Title: NEG-02: Error Handling When Cover Page Generation Fails
COS Reference/Expected Results: Error message is displayed when cover page generation fails

Step Expected: UI shows the cover page option

Step Action: Simulate a failure in cover page generation

Title: REG-01: Existing Report Generation Flow Not Broken
COS Reference/Expected Results: Existing report generation flow is not affected by the cover page generation feature

Step Action: Generate a report without a cover page

Step Expected: Report content is correct and not affected by the cover page generation feature

Title: REG-02: Cover Page Generation Does Not Affect Report Content
COS Reference/Expected Results: Cover page generation does not affect the report content

Step Action: Generate a report with a cover page

Step Expected: Report content is correct and not affected by the cover page generation feature
